resources.string: About the seeds:\nSeeds is a character string used to generate random address. You can input anything you like here. And you have not been to remember it. Be aware that you can not get the same address even though input the same seeds here.
About the PIN:\nPIN is a six-digit-number used to unlock this wallet address for INK wallet app. It is not related with your web-wallet-PIN. Each time when you log out, you have to reset it.
Here is your wallet address and mnemonics

지갑 주소는 고객님의 지갑 ID이며, 타인에게 알려주어 송금받을 수 있습니다. Mnemonics is used to restore your wallet in other devices ore in the case of logging out. Ink will not save your mnemonics, so you can not re-get it after losing…\n Do Remember Your Mnemonics and don\'t share them with anyone…
Mnemonics are used to restore your wallet in other devices or when you log out. Be aware them just for yourself.
Copy mnemonics and save them digitally may cause security risks.\n\nWe strongly suggest you write them down, without relying on any network service and digit devices.
You can not access to this wallet if you don\'t write down your mnemonics.
Input address, long press to paste

1. Who May Use the Services
You may use the Services only if you agree to form a binding contract with Twitter and are not a person barred from receiving services under the laws of the applicable jurisdiction. In any case, you must be at least 13 years old to use the Services. If you are accepting these Terms and using the Services on behalf of a company, organization, government, of other legal entity, you represent and warrant that you are authorized to do so.

2. Privacy
You may use the Services only if you agree to form a binding contract with Twitter and are not a person barred from receiving services under the laws of the applicable jurisdiction. In any case, you must be at least 13 years old to use the Services

3. Content on the Services
You are responsible for your use of the Services and for any Content you provide, including compliance with applicable laws, rules.
